en_US.project_summary: BigOne is a leading global digital asset trading and custody platform that helps users find high-quality blockchain assets worldwide. It provides digital currency trading and market inquiry services for Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Polkadot (DOT), USDT, and other cryptocurrencies. With top-notch technology and security control processes, Beex ensures the safety of users' digital assets and helps them manage their assets.

zh_CN.project_summary: 币格是全球领先的数字资产交易及托管平台,帮助用户寻找全球优质区块链资产,提供比特币(BTC)、以太坊(ETH)、波卡(DOT)、USDT等数字货币交易与行情查询服务,以顶尖的技术和安全控制流程保障用户数字资产安全,帮助用户进行资产管理。
